hh.Gender: desc_Which gender do you identify with the most?

bias.Enjoy my municipality: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I enjoy living in my municipality]
bias.Enjoy my neighborhood: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I enjoy living in my neighborhood]
bias.Capable municipality: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [The municipality is best able to determine the most affordable way to phase out natural gas]
bias.Capable individuals: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [Residents are capable of deciding for themselves how to phase out natural gas]
bias.Equal heat price: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [Heat prices should be as equal as possible for everyone in the municipality]
bias.Climate-conscious: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I am climate-conscious]
bias.Reactance municipality: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I believe the municipality has already decided everything about the heat transition, and my opinion does not matter]

bias2.PONG alternatives: desc_Had you heard about the alternatives to natural gas (heating network and/or heat pump) before participating in this choice game?
bias2.People PONG positive: desc_In your opinion, how many people are positive about phasing out natural gas?
bias2.DH opinion: desc_What is your opinion on district heating after having heard everything?
bias2.HP opinion: desc_What is your opinion on heat pumps after having heard everything?
